    @allure.title("Validate the Nitrosamine residue verification final summary page")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Create Protocol for nitrosamine residue verification and "
                        "validate the final summary details")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cumczrd")
    @pytest.mark.validate_final_summary_nitrosamine_residue_verification_details
    def test_validate_final_summary_nitrosamine_residue_verification_details(self):
        data = self.test_create_protocol_nitrosamine_residue_verification_based_on_policy()
        no_of_runs_payload = number_of_runs_sample_limits()
    
        data.update({"no_of_runs_payload": no_of_runs_payload})
    
        self.protocol_common_method.update_protocol_residue_verification_sample_limits_run(data)
    
        final_summary = self.protocol_common_method.get_active_final_summary_details(data)["response"]
    
        equipments_id = self.protocol_common_method.get_protocol_equipments_ids(data)
        for i in equipments_id:
            if i["external_id"] == 'EQM-3':
                continue
            if i["external_id"] == 'EQM-2':
                continue
            data.update({"equipment": i["equipment_id"], "external_id": i["external_id"],
                         "columns": self.EXCELS_COLUMNS, "sample_type": "Nitrosamine"})
            sample_limits = json.loads(final_summary)["result"]
            data.update({"sample_profile": sample_limits})
